body:
`unifyfs@0.9.2` fails to build using:
* spack@develop (295377b2b4695f30e79f4bd877fd85476a8febb9 from `Tue Apr 27 14:20:32 2021 -0400`)
* RHEL 8 - GCC 8.3.1
* Ubuntu 20.04 - GCC 9.3.0

Concrete spec: [unifyfs-epk2wg.spec.yaml.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6387011/unifyfs-epk2wg.spec.yaml.txt)
Container: `ecpe4s/ubuntu20.04-runner-x86_64:2021-03-10`
Build log: [unifyfs-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6387032/unifyfs-build-out.txt)

```
$> spack mirror add e4s https://cache.e4s.io
$> spack buildcache keys -it

$> spack install --cache-only --only dependencies --include-build-deps -f ./unifyfs-epk2wg.spec.yaml

$> spack install --no-cache -f ./unifyfs-epk2wg.spec.yaml
...
==> Installing unifyfs-0.9.2-epk2wgxyrlqe7pl6qddwabc4467a7fko
==> Fetching https://spack-llnl-mirror.s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/_source-cache/archive/70/7046625dc0677535f5d960187cb2e2d58a6f8cfb4dc6a3604f825257eb0891aa.tar.gz
###################################################################################################################################################################################### 100.0%
==> No patches needed for unifyfs
==> unifyfs: Executing phase: 'autoreconf'
==> unifyfs: Executing phase: 'configure'
==> unifyfs: Executing phase: 'build'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make'

5 errors found in build log:
     554    /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-unifyfs-0.9.2-epk2wgxyrlqe7pl6qddwabc4467a7fko/spack-src/examples/src/testlib.h:221:45: warning: implicit declaration of function 'minor' [-Wi
            mplicit-function-declaration]
     555      221 |            (long) major(sb->st_dev), (long) minor(sb->st_dev));
     556          |                                             ^~~~~
     557      CCLD     sysio-open-static
     558    /usr/bin/ld: ../../client/src/.libs/libunifyfs.a(libunifyfs_la-unifyfs-sysio.o): warning: the `getwd' function is dangerous and should not be used.
     559    /usr/bin/ld: sysio_open_static-sysio-open.o: in function `dump_stat':
  >> 560    /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-unifyfs-0.9.2-epk2wgxyrlqe7pl6qddwabc4467a7fko/spack-src/examples/src/testlib.h:221: undefined reference to `minor'
  >> 561    /usr/bin/ld: /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-unifyfs-0.9.2-epk2wgxyrlqe7pl6qddwabc4467a7fko/spack-src/examples/src/testlib.h:221: undefined reference to `major'
  >> 562    /usr/bin/ld: /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-unifyfs-0.9.2-epk2wgxyrlqe7pl6qddwabc4467a7fko/spack-src/examples/src/testlib.h:242: undefined reference to `minor'
  >> 563    /usr/bin/ld: /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-unifyfs-0.9.2-epk2wgxyrlqe7pl6qddwabc4467a7fko/spack-src/examples/src/testlib.h:242: undefined reference to `major'
  >> 564    collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
     565    make[3]: *** [Makefile:1361: sysio-open-static] Error 1
     566    make[3]: Leaving directory '/tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-unifyfs-0.9.2-epk2wgxyrlqe7pl6qddwabc4467a7fko/spack-src/spack-build/examples/src'
     567    make[2]: *** [Makefile:397: all-recursive] Error 1
     568    make[2]: Leaving directory '/tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-unifyfs-0.9.2-epk2wgxyrlqe7pl6qddwabc4467a7fko/spack-src/spack-build/examples'
     569    make[1]: *** [Makefile:497: all-recursive] Error 1
     570    make[1]: Leaving directory '/tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-unifyfs-0.9.2-epk2wgxyrlqe7pl6qddwabc4467a7fko/spack-src/spack-build'

See build log for details:
  /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-unifyfs-0.9.2-epk2wgxyrlqe7pl6qddwabc4467a7fko/spack-build-out.txt
```

@CamStan
title: unifyfs 0.9.2 build fails: undefined reference to 'major', 'minor'
